mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(NO,TITLE,WRITER,CONTENT,FILENAME) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NO), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD),#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{fileName})
INSERT INTO B_MOOD(no) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NO), 0) FROM BOARD))
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT a.*,(SELECT count(*) from BOARD_COMMENT where no = a.no) comment_cnt FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS R FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY NO DESC) B) a
WHERE R >= #{startRow} AND R <= #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT N.*,ROWNUM AS R FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY UNI DESC) N)
WHERE R >= #{startRow} AND R <= #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY UNI DESC

SELECT NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CNT DESC, REGDATE DESC) AS RANK FROM (SELECT NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, CNT FROM BOARD ORDER BY CNT DESC)
where rownum <= 5 AND REGDATE between ADD_MONTHS ( TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM'), -1) AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CNT = CNT + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}

UPDATE B_MOOD
SET GOOD = GOOD + 1
SET BAD = BAD + 1
WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE NO = #{no}
